greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: A008277 * A007318.
formula: A008277 * A007318 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: T:= (n, k)-> add(Stirling2(n, j)*binomial(j-1, k-1), j=k..n):
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..10);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 03 2019
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 29 2008
